body_html:
Hi, according to http://stackoverflow.com/a/42169898/4571192 ,

  1. there will be java api for setting session options soon, anybody know when will it be?
  2. It's possible to manually set the session options to enable multicore/multithread support, but I don't know exactly how to achieve this. Could someone guide me how to do this?
body_text:
Hi, according to http://stackoverflow.com/a/42169898/4571192 ,

there will be java api for setting session options soon, anybody know when will it be?
It's possible to manually set the session options to enable multicore/multithread support, but I don't know exactly how to achieve this. Could someone guide me how to do this?
body:
Hi, according to http://stackoverflow.com/a/42169898/4571192 , 
1) there will be java api for setting session options soon, anybody know when will it be?
2) It's possible to manually set the session options to enable multicore/multithread support, but I don't know exactly how to achieve this. Could someone guide me how to do this?
